summary: When a white man sets out to keep Indians drunk so they'll do what he wants them to, the US government sends Autry to fix things.
cast: Gene Autry|Champion|Carolina Cotton|Harry Lauter|Mary Scott|Sydney Mason|Francis X. Bushman|The Cass County Boys|Tony Whitecloud's Jemez Indians|Pat Buttram|Gregg Barton|Iron Eyes Cody|Bert Dodson|Frank Ellis|Byron Foulger|Tom London|Fred S. Martin|Frankie Marvin|Frank Matts|Kermit Maynard|Mathew McCue|Eddie Parker|Jerry Scoggins|Mickey Simpson|Jack Tornek|Tony Whitecloud|Harry Wilson|Bob Woodward
title: Apache Country
